sub_categories.name: Engineering
sub_categories.desc: Junior transfer admits are exempt from Engin 26. Fall 2020 and Fall 2021 junior transfer admits are exempt from Engin 78. Fall 2020 and Fall 2021 junior transfer admits may substitute Engin 25 +27 for Engin 29.

sub_categories.name: Technical Electives (15 units)
sub_categories.desc:
12 units must be upper division and 9 units must be from ME sponsored courses. One course must be a design course chosen from:
Engin 128; ME 101, 110, C117, 119,
130, 135, 146, 165, C176, C178
One course must be a quantitative science course chosen from:
Engin 117, 150, 177; ME 120, 131, C134, 136, C180
All design and quantitative science courses listed above count toward the 9 units of upper division ME courses. Other approved quantitative science courses (that do not count toward the 9 units of upper division ME courses) are listed here: http://www.me.berkeley.edu/undergraduate/ course-information/quantitative-science
Of the remaining units, up to 3 may be lower division.
